title: Is leaver buster bugged?
body:
So recently I had the firewall issue pop up so I couldn't reconnect to the game before my team remade, upon the game concluding I was dealt a 5 game que timer ban(this is the only leave in recent history) and I was slightly annoyed at this but copped it on the chin and dealt with it, just played a normal's game where we opened mid at 12 or so minutes, so myself(thresh) and 2 others were running around in their jg just having fun while we waited for them to end, upon which it reset my que ban back to 5 games, I was never afk, was moving the whole time and for some reason leaver buster flagged me as afk and dealt me with a que ban?

Tl;dr received 2 5 game que bans with disconnecting once due to firewall error, linked my match history to prove my point. the last game I left before the gragas game where I got the firewall error was literally 60 games previous?
